snippet: The Obama administration made a powerful argument against California’s gay marriage ban, but it disappointingly stopped a step short.
abstract: Editorial lauds Pres Obama for joining fight to overturn California's ban on same-sex marriage, but questions why his Supreme Court brief stopped short of declaring that all attempts to ban it are unconstitutional;  expresses hope that justices recognize this broader truth.
lead_paragraph: The Obama administration made a powerful argument against California’s gay marriage ban, but it disappointingly stopped a step short.

headline.seo: The White House Joins the Fight on Gay Marriage
headline.main: The White House Joins the Fight
headline.print_headline: The White House Joins the Fight

keywords.value: Same-Sex Marriage, Civil Unions and Domestic Partnerships
keywords.name: subject
